problem: Rotation of spray arm assembly becomes unstable when pressure of liquid varies during use of dishwasher
solution_function: Stabilize rotation of wash arm assembly during dynamic operational conditions of dishwasher
solution_structure: Wash arm with a circular opening and mounting unit with a circular insertion portion and supporting portion that extends radially from the circular insertion portion
solution_implementation: Mounting unit is inserted at least partly into the circular opening of wash arm to allow rotation around its rotational axis
effect: Improved rotational stability of wash arm assembly during dishwasher operation
